Class AdminAccount

extends Account
    this class extends to the superclass account it is has the behavior of the administrator account.

      • viewEmployee

        public java.sql.ResultSet viewEmployee(java.lang.String id)
        This methods returns result set and its behavior is to view the employees that is in the query.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • addEmployee

        public boolean addEmployee(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String address,
                           java.lang.String CN,
                           java.lang.String ECN,
                           java.lang.String Department,
                           java.lang.String bd,
                           java.lang.String sex,
                           java.lang.String rate)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method returns a boolean expression has the behavior to add employee to the query.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the employee to be addded
        address - the address of the employee to be addded
        CN - the contact number of the employee to be addded
        ECN - the emergency contact number of the employee to be addded
        Department - the department name of the employee to be added
        bd - the birth date of the employee to be addded
        sex - the sex of the employee to be addded
        rate - employee's rate to be added
        Returns:
        return a true if the employee was successfully added, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws any exception if an error happens
